name: Mary D. and Thomas DANIEL, Respondents v. WYETH INC., Wyeth Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Wyeth-Ayerst Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Wyeth-Ayerst International, Inc., Wyeth Laboratories, Inc. and Wyeth Pharmaceuticals Division of Wyeth, Petitioners

parties: Mary D. and Thomas DANIEL, Respondents v. WYETH INC., Wyeth Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Wyeth-Ayerst Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Wyeth-Ayerst International, Inc., Wyeth Laboratories, Inc. and Wyeth Pharmaceuticals Division of Wyeth, Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of July, 2008, the Petition for Review is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
952 A.2d 1168
Mary D. and Thomas DANIEL, Respondents v. WYETH INC., Wyeth Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Wyeth-Ayerst Pharmaceuticals, Inc., Wyeth-Ayerst International, Inc., Wyeth Laboratories, Inc. and Wyeth Pharmaceuticals Division of Wyeth, Petitioners.
No. 9 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 8, 2008.
